extends java.lang.Object
    Susis log is a kind of reflection about the conversation in the past

    • Method Detail

      • getUnanswered

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getUnanswered()

      • unanswered2tokenizedstats

        public java.util.List<SusiMemory.TokenMapList> unanswered2tokenizedstats()
        transform unanswered into a statistic for the number of occurrences of words. The words are computed by tokenization of all unanswered phrases. The result is a list of tokens, attached with a list of sentences which contains the token. The list is ordered in reverse order of the number of sentences where the token appears.
        Parameters:
        unanswered -
        Returns:
